data.actual_result: You're being jumped back to the earliest blocked message that has been loaded by the app.
data.expected_result: Your position in chat should still be at the bottom as you've already caught up with everything.
data.short_description: When switching between read channels that both contain blocked messages the chat will jump up towards (presumably) the oldest loaded blocked message
data.steps_to_repro: - Have two channels in which messages have been posted by users you blocked (the messages don't have to be from the same user; for the best result make sure the blocked messages are a little bit up) - Switch from channel A to B - Observe your position in the chat
